jobDescription: Robert Half Technology is seeking a Data Analyst for one of our clients in Southern California. Our client, one of the nation's top mortgage lenders, is looking to expand their team in Irvine. This Data Analyst will be able to plan and implement the overall advanced analytics strategy. Being proficient in SQL is preferred as you will also be tasked to extract critical information from databases to work in collaboration with the Sales, Marketing, Operations and other Departments on a wide variety of advanced analytics and analytic processes projects.  For immediate consideration for this position please contact Mark Ecal @ 858-812-0581  Please send resumes to mark.ecal@rht.com  I can also be reached via LinkedIn at https://www.linkedin.com/in/markecal/
